get_qform.title: Get Qform
get_qform.description: Prints the 16 elements of the qform matrix

set_sform.description: Sets the 16 elements of the sform matrix

set_qform.title: Set Qform
set_qform.description: Sets the 16 elements of the qform matrix

copy_qform_to_sform.title: Copy Qform to Sform
copy_qform_to_sform.description: Sets the sform equal to the qform - code and matrix

copy_sform_to_qform.title: Copy Sform to Qform

swap_orient.title: Swap Orientation
